description: This file defines the root layout component for a Qwik-based web application. It sets up the page structure with a TopBar, sidebar, and main content slot, and includes an onGet request handler to manage cache control headers.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that renders the layout structure with TopBar, Sidebar, and Slot

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Request handler that sets cache control headers for the page
